publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2102 Mr David Davidson: Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza—That the Parliament recognises the hard work and co-operation of the Montrose Aerodrome Museum Society, the Strathmore Vintage Vehicle Club, Angus Council, Tayside Police, Red Cross and the Air Training Corps in making the Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza such a success in the face of a difficult season for the tourism industry and encourages all local authorities to support community organised events that are of interest to tourists and boost local economies.

S1M-2102 Mr David Davidson: Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza—That the Parliament recognises the hard work and co-operation of the Montrose Aerodrome Museum Society, the Strathmore Vintage Vehicle Club, Angus Council, Tayside Police, Red Cross and the Air Training Corps in making the Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza such a success in the face of a difficult season for the tourism industry and encourages all local authorities to support community organised events that are of interest to tourists and boost local economies.
S1M-2102 Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza (lodged on 7 August 2001) Mary Scanlon*

S1M-2102 Mr David Davidson: Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza-That the Parliament recognises the hard work and co-operation of the Montrose Aerodrome Museum Society, the Strathmore Vintage Vehicle Club, Angus Council, Tayside Police, Red Cross and the Air Training Corps in making the Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza such a success in the face of a difficult season for the tourism industry and encourages all local authorities to support community organised events that are of interest to tourists and boost local economies. Supported by: Mary Scanlon
S1M-2102 Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza (lodged on 7 August 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-2102 Mr David Davidson: Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza—That the Parliament recognises the hard work and co-operation of the Montrose Aerodrome Museum Society, the Strathmore Vintage Vehicle Club, Angus Council, Tayside Police, Red Cross and the Air Training Corps in making the Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza such a success in the face of a difficult season for the tourism industry and encourages all local authorities to support community organised events that are of interest to tourists and boost local economies. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Mr Jamie McGrigor

S1M-2102 Mr David Davidson: Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza-That the Parliament recognises the hard work and co-operation of the Montrose Aerodrome Museum Society, the Strathmore Vintage Vehicle Club, Angus Council, Tayside Police, Red Cross and the Air Training Corps in making the Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza such a success in the face of a difficult season for the tourism industry and encourages all local authorities to support community organised events that are of interest to tourists and boost local economies. Supported by: Mary Scanlon, Mr Jamie McGrigor

S1M-2102 Mr David Davidson: Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza-That the Parliament recognises the hard work and co-operation of the Montrose Aerodrome Museum Society, the Strathmore Vintage Vehicle Club, Angus Council, Tayside Police, Red Cross and the Air Training Corps in making the Montrose Vehicle Extravaganza such a success in the face of a difficult season for the tourism industry and encourages all local authorities to support community organised events that are of interest to tourists and boost local economies.
